duties_responsibilities.duty: Automate test execution process using MS PowerShell and Python scripting.
Plan and execute hardware setup for network design and qualification testing.
Define and execute test plans for server components and security features.
Troubleshoot hardware issues and perform bug triage with engineering groups.
Collaborate with cloud engineering groups and participate in hardware roadmap discussions.
Develop and maintain PowerBI reports for KPIs and incident management.
Document rack and SKU level production designs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
